🏗️ Set up test environment for SSH key authentication validation

test.name: Critical - Connect to Code Server
test.doc: 🔗 SSH directly to the code server (Linux jump box) to prepare for SSH key-based authentication testing
test.status: Parent suite setup failed: TimeoutError: timed out

test.name: Critical - Test Passwordless SSH Authentication
test.doc: 🔐 From the code server, attempt SSH connection to target machine using key-based authentication without password prompts, verify the connection succeeds, check authorized_keys file permissions (should be 600), and capture connection details
test.status: Parent suite setup failed: TimeoutError: timed out

test.name: Critical - Validate Authentication Security
test.doc: 🛡️ Confirm passwordless SSH works from code server to target, verify authorized_keys file contains correct public keys with proper permissions (600), validate SSH configuration, and ensure the jump box authentication chain is properly configured
test.status: Parent suite setup failed: TimeoutError: timed out
